Davenport.All Saints Episcopal Church, Moline:
All Saints Episcopal Church is a parish of the Episcopal Church located in Moline, Illinois. The parish was initially founded as a parish of the Diocese of Quincy and became part of the Diocese of Chicago following the reunification of the two dioceses.
When a large portion of the Quincy diocese decided to leave the Episcopal Church, both Trinity Parish in Rock Island and Christ Church in Moline agreed.
